---
title: Netlify CLI open command
---

# `open`

<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (GENERATE_COMMANDS_DOCS) -->
Opens current project urls in browser

**Usage**

```bash
netlify open
```

| Subcommand | description  |
|:--------------------------- |:-----|
| open:admin | Opens current site admin UI in netlify  |
| open:site | Opens current site url in browser  |


## `open:admin`

Opens current site admin UI in netlify

**Usage**

```bash
netlify open:admin
```

---
## `open:site`

Opens current site url in browser

**Usage**

```bash
netlify open:site
```

---


<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
